name: Mountain Fold
description:
Z - Bunny Transformation

X - Elephant Transformation

Space - Jump if bunny, destroy ball papers if elephant

It's my participation for Ludum Dare 35. The theme was shapeshifting and I wanna to use only "real" materials, so all the assets use something on reality. Meaning the origamis are real =).

Because of that challenge I don't make a really innovating game mechanic just try with new materials.And I started with less than 48hours so yeah I like the results =).

It's really buggy on collisions but in another day I will correct that.
